p: This study was carried out in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki and the guidelines set by the Research Ethics Committee, Scientific Council of the Ministry of Health, Hungary. This Committee agreed to the use of discarded human tissue for the experimental work. The protocol was approved by the ETT-TUKEB (Scientific Council of the Ministry of Health, Research Ethical Committee) [No. 17861-0/2010-1018EKU (749/PI/10)]. All subjects gave written informed consent in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki.
